verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kiriath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* Abinadab’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “If \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*, \w then|strong="H7725"\w* \w rid|strong="H5337"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5236"\w* gods \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Ashtoreths \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w Him|strong="H3027"\w* \w only|strong="H3605"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* said, “\w Gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w behalf|strong="H1157"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w drew|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* confessed, “\w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \f + \fr 7:6 \ft Or governed or led; similarly in verses 15, 16, and 17\f* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w their|strong="H6440"\w* rulers \w marched|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* learned \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w suckling|strong="H2461"\w* \w lamb|strong="H2924"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H3632"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w behalf|strong="H1157"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* charged \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w striking|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w way|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* area \w below|strong="H8478"\w* \w Beth-car|strong="H1033"\w*.

Afterward, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w between|strong="H5704"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shen|strong="H8129"\w*.\f + \fr 7:12 \ft Hebrew; LXX and Syriac Jeshanah\f* \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* Ebenezer,\f + \fr 7:12 \ft Ebenezer means stone of help.\f* saying, “\w Thus|strong="H2008"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w stopped|strong="H6430"\w* invading \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, \w which|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w*, \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* surrounding \w territory|strong="H1366"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w between|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* Amorites.

So \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w circuit|strong="H5437"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w places|strong="H4725"\w*.
